text: @tedcruz Senator, how are Houstonians (and all Texans) supposed to go back to work when just a week ago Governor Abbott said the growing #COVID19 numbers are a huge concern and it could become the “epicenter” of a breakout in Texas? How does that statement and going back to work coincide?
